import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./menu.css" function MenuDisplay({myprops,total,closeMenu}) { console.log(myprops) const mytabledata=total.map((prop)=>{ return(
Ingredient Measurment
{prop.strIngredient1} {prop.strMeasure1}
) }) return

{myprops.strMeal}

{mytabledata}

Recipe

{myprops.strInstructions}

; } export default MenuDisplay;
